casebody.data:
Harry Herman SLACKMAN, Appellant v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 13817. United States Court of Appeals Fifth Circuit. May 15, 1952. Rehearing Denied June 2, 1952. Joe H. Jones, Dallas, Tex., for appellant. Lester L. May, Asst. U. S. Atty., Frank B. Potter, U. S. Atty., Fort Worth, Tex., for appellee. *

Before HOLMES, STRUM, and RIVES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
